title: Research optimal CLI output formats for call trees and code graphs - AI-consumable
Research gopls capabilities and produce full report
Document optimal AI-only output format findings
Write README.md and product design doc
description:
## Context
We've completed research on gopls (see docs/gopls-report.md) and designed 
Wildcat's approach through conversation. Need to capture this in formal docs.

## Scope
1. README.md - Public-facing, explains premise and value proposition
   - Problem: gopls is IDE-focused, not AI-optimized
   - Solution: Wildcat - Go static analysis for AI agents
   - Key features: symbol-based queries, JSON output, actionable results
   - Examples showing the difference

2. docs/product-design.md - Detailed feature specs
   - Target user: AI agents (Claude, etc.)
   - Command specifications (callers, tree, refs, etc.)
   - Output format specs (JSON structure)
   - Filtering/limiting options
   - Error handling approach

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] README.md captures value prop clearly
- [ ] Product design doc has detailed specs for MVP commands
- [ ] Both reference research in docs/gopls-report.md

## Relevant Files
- docs/gopls-report.md - Gap analysis
- docs/research.md - Initial design notes
